mapper.select: select * from user_info where info like CONCAT('%', #{parameter}, '%')

SELECT p.prod_nm, p.price, p.point , o.order_sts, o.order_dt FROM order_master o INNER JOIN order_detail od ON o.order_no=od.order_no INNER JOIN prod_master p ON od.prod_no = p.prod_no WHERE o.order_no = #{order_no}

SELECT o.order_dt, um.user_nm, am.addr_tel, am.zipcode, am.addr, am.addr_detail, o.order_sts FROM order_master o INNER JOIN addr_manage am ON o.user_id = am.user_id INNER JOIN user_master um ON am.user_id = um.user_id WHERE o.order_no = #{order_no}
SELECT pm.main_img, pm.price, pm.prod_nm, od.qty, od.price, od.point, od.order_no FROM order_detail od INNER JOIN prod_master pm on od.prod_no = pm.prod_no WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}
